committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to permit Members of Congress to withdraw from the Civil Service Retirement System.

summary.text: Permits Members of Congress to elect to withdraw from the civil service retirement system. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8331(8)(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to permit Members of Congress to withdraw from the Civil Service Retirement System.
